newsitem.title: FRANCE: Swastikas, anti-semitic slogans on French synagogue.
newsitem.headline: Swastikas, anti-semitic slogans on French synagogue.

text.p: Thirty-two swastikas, four gallows and Nazi slogans like "Heil Hitler" and "Jews out of Europe" were found scrawled on the walls of a synagogue in the southern French city of Nice on Thursday, police said.
The symbols and slogans, scrawled overnight in black marker pen, appeared one day after racist slogans were found written on the walls of a local school, they said.
Police have opened an investigation, they added.
Another slogan found on the synagogue walls was "white zyklon-B," referring to the gas the Nazis used to murder Jews in their wartime concentration camps.
